#### PR description:

Implementing fix to issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/48328 as suggested by @mmusich. 

#### PR validation:

The fix has been verified to solve the problem coming up on in run 393240, lumi 1797, event 4144833887. Usual `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos` tests have also been done.

FYI: @24LopezR
title: Protect SoftMuonMvaRun3Estimator from returning nan
